JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and ResponsibilitiesWe are looking for talented, highly motivated candidates with 5+ years of software development experience using Python.What you will be doing- Writing clean, high-quality, high-performance, maintainable code- Develop, implement, integrate, test, deploy and support software- Participate in code reviews- Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverablesWhat We Need To See- Proficiency in Python- Full stack development experience in developing web applications, RESTful APIs, Front-end: HTML, CSS, AJAX, JQuery, JavaScript- Proficiency in SQLAlchemy- Proficiency in Git- Experience with one or more database technologies like Postgres, Redis, MongoDB, etc.- Familiarity with Bash and developing software on Linux- Familiarity with deploying and managing Docker- Keen sense of urgency, highly motivated, and ability to learn quickly- Experience with Flask or Django.Ways To Stand Out From The Crowd- Public git projects using python, javascript, and/or any of the languages listed above- Experience with build systems such as Buildroot or Yocto- Experience with client-side data visualization libraries- Experience with FastAPI.

EDUCATION.UG: B.Sc in Any Specialization, BCA in Computers, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
